## Geographic Targeting

Top locations targeted by advertisers.

```{r setup}
#| echo: false
#| warning: false
#| message: false
#| error: false
#| results: 'hide'

# Load required libraries
library(dashboardr)
library(dplyr)
library(highcharter)

# Global chunk options
knitr::opts_chunk$set(
  echo = FALSE,
  warning = FALSE,
  message = FALSE,
  error = FALSE,
  fig.width = 12,
  fig.height = 8,
  dpi = 300
)

# Load data
data <- readRDS('dataset_small_30obs.rds')

# Data summary
cat('Dataset loaded:', nrow(data), 'rows,', ncol(data), 'columns\n')

```

## Top Geographic Targets

```{r bar-location}
# Top Geographic Targets
result <- create_bar(
  data = data,
  title = "Top Geographic Targets",
  horizontal = TRUE,
  x_var = "location",
  weight_var = "spend"
)

result
```
